message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Let's see how it goes!
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can have 20% and I'll take 80%. Let's see if you'll accept this one.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 70/30.  We're losing money with every round, so it's in our best interest to find a solution quickly.
